name: Protection
description:
The SECRIOUS research project is proud to present "Protection"! 

A small, easy to play, hard to get game about a "what" that is doing "what" in a "what"!  

Jump into the game and answer all those "whats" afterwards:

https://zi8cd953wnv.typeform.com/to/pNlXWc2W

Want to know more about what we are doing? We are very secrious about it. Check out the links below:
